name: How We Make Friends
description:
The aim of the game is to match people with common interests.

Match characters by drawing links with right mouse click.

Move characters by left mouse click and drag.

There are three types of character: standard, ugly and beautiful.

The "ugly" character should be double clicked on to score points, otherwise they infect other characters and transform them into "ugly" characters too.

The beautiful character attracts other characters towards them.

Press "R" to restart the game.

Enjoy!
